My dissertation, entitled “Social Capital after Deepwater Horizon: A Multi-Method Analysis of Network Resources, Structure, and Change Following an Environmental Disaster,” examines the personal-network communities of oysterworkers whose livelihoods were negatively affected by the Deepwater Horizon oil spill.
